title:
Increase productivity of your teams
and ensure the security of your data

user.title: Advanced management of users
user.content: Easily manage your employees, external partners as well as the security and access of your products. The kSuite dashboard allows you to control all aspects of your business from a single place.

team.title: Teams management
team.content: Create work teams with specific rights and access to facilitate the management of your employees. kSuite simplifies and speeds up all your personnel movement management.

calendar.title: Calendars and shared addresses
calendar.content: Create work teams with specific rights and access to facilitate the management of your employees. kSuite simplifies and speeds up all your personnel movement management.
